entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
